thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie
thread.title: Luminita

author: Luminita
title: Luminita
text:
They have renewable energy and this is one of the reasons I choose them. Until now I am very happy. The only problem was when they connect my house, I had a prepay service, and they didn't let me know. So for about 2 weeks, I paid the prepaid and also them. They didn't announce me that I am connected, after waiting for 3 weeks, that is when I made the request.
Maybe is my opinion, but this is a little unprofessional.
